result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Billy C Evans

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Billy C Evans in Court, in custody.  Attorney Owen M Piotrowski in Court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Status hearing. Attorney Anderson is in Jury Trial in Branch 12 and not available for today's hearing. Discussion placed on the record. Attorney Anderson was recently appointed on Defendant's new case, 22CF3427. Case adjourned for Status hearing, Branch 46. Status hearing scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 08:45 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.
All previously ordered conditions of bail remain.

Defendant Billy C Evans in Court, in custody.  Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in Court for Billy C Evans.  Attorney Owen M Piotrowski in Court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Bail/Bond hearing. Court reviewed Defense counsel's Motion to Modify Bail. Discussion placed on the record. State complied with Victim Notification. Arguments heard regarding bail. Court addressed Demand for Speedy Trial, Defendant's NEW CASE (22CF3427), and Defendant's federal hold. For reasons stated on the record, Court GRANTED Defense counsel's Motion to Modify Bail. Court CONVERTED Cash Bail to Signature Bond. 
Court ordered case adjourned for Status hearing, Branch 46. Status hearing scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 09:00 am in Room 113 of the Safety Building.

Defendant Billy C Evans in Court, in custody.  Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in Court for Billy C Evans.  Attorney Owen M Piotrowski in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Final PreTrial. Discussion placed on the record. Case remains in trial posture. State advised the Court of Defendant's NEW CASE, 22CF3427. State addressed Defendant's federal cases. For reasons stated on the record, Court VACATED SPEEDY Jury Trial date. Court ordered case adjourned for Bail/Bond and Status hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. 
Bail/Bond and Status hearing scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 09:00 am in Room 113 of the Safety Building.

Defendant Billy C Evans in court with attorney Scott Franklin Anderson.  Defendant Billy C Evans in custody.  Owen M Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in Court for Final PreTrial. Discussion placed on the record. Parties requested adjournment and selected new date. Court ordered case adjourned for Final PreTrial hearing and SPEEDY Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Final PreTrial hearing scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 1:45 pm. Hearing will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building. SPEEDY Jury Trial scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 09:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.

Defendant Billy C Evans in court with attorney Scott Franklin Anderson.  Defendant Billy C Evans in custody.  Owen M Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND, Expires 09-07-2022.

Defendant Billy C Evans in court with attorney Scott Franklin Anderson.  Defendant Billy C Evans in custody.  Owen M Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in Court for Scheduling Conference. Discussion placed on the record.Defense counsel requested Final PreTrial and Jury Trial dates. Court ordered parties to submit their Motions in Limine, Jury Instructions, and Witness Lists by the Final PreTrial date. Any Motions are due by the Final PreTrial date. If the parties believe a necessary witness for the State or Defense requires independent representation, they are to make arrangements for that representation through the Public Defender's Office two (2) weeks in advance of the Final PreTrial. Court ordered case adjourned for Final PreTrial and SPEEDY Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. 

Final PreTrial scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 10:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building. Defendant will appear IN PERSON. 
SPEEDY Jury Trial scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 09:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.

Defendant Billy C Evans in Court with Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson.  Defendant Billy C Evans in custody.  Owen M Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in Court for Scheduling Conference. Defendant appeared via Zoom Video Conference. Defense and State appeared in Room 113 of the Safety Building. Discussion placed on the record. Defense received discovery material; however, has NOT received an offer from the State. Defense requested additional time to review discovery with Defendant. Court granted request. Court ordered Defense and State to meet/talk at least 48 hours in advance of the next Court date. Case adjourned for Status hearing, Branch 46. Status hearing scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 03:45 pm. Hearing will be held IN-PERSON in Room 113 of the Safety Building. DEFENDANT WILL BE PRODUCED.

Defendant Billy C Evans in court by video with Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson who appears in person.  Defendant Billy C Evans in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective M. Finkley.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 46.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

NEW DATE: Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Information provided to MCSO.

Attorney Anderson contacted the Court and ADA Piotrowski via email regarding Preliminary hearing. 
Attorney Anderson is NOT available April 20, 2022.

Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense - NO REIMBURSEMENT FROM DEFENDANT; signed and filed.
Attorney Scott Anderson

Defendant Billy C Evans in Court, in custody.  Owen M Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Order to Show Cause hearing. Public Defender's Office has NOT been able to appoint counsel. Discussion placed on the record. Court found Defendant is eligible for appointment of counsel and agreed to reimburse Milwaukee County for the expense. Court appointed Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson to represent Defendant in this matter at County expense and at the rate of $100.00 per hour. Court ordered the Defendant DOES NOT REIMBURSE THE COUNTY. Court ordered case adjourned for Preliminary hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Preliminary hearing scheduled April 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm before Commissioner Phillips.

COURT CONTINUED TOLLING OF TIME LIMITS FOR PRELIMINARY HEARING.

Defendant Billy C Evans not in court, defendant in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for a Preliminary hearing. State's witness is present. SPD needs more time to appoint representation. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for an Order to Show Cause hearing in Br. 46.  Hearing scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Billy C Evans not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Detective Finkley was present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Case charged by ADA Owen Piotrowski. Per Chief Judge Directive 21-13, this case is transferred to Judge Feiss, Branch 46.

Defendant Billy C Evans not in court, defendant in custody.  John Daniel Flynn appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with Desean A. W.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Billy C Evans in court with attorney Charles Robert Roozen.  Defendant Billy C Evans in custody.  Stephanie Krueger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Hanrahan, Branch 04. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.   Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4). Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.

Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
K-Warrant
